title: Tzen
content:
Well, it seems Blegd and Smeeg has taken a somewhat... extended hiatus. This has rather dissapointed its new zealand fans, so much so that two of them [yours truly and Sarah] have decided to create a related webcomic grafted onto its storyline.

Graphics will be by Sarah [some of you may have met her before] and writing by me. [Since I'm too lazy to do anything else] and will broadly follow the adventures of Tzen, a vorticon who is sent to earth to retrieve the holy pogostick that was recently swiped. [No, she doesn't know why anyone wants it either]

As yet we have no idea when it'll be uploaded, and since we don't have a ssite to put stuff on [not to mention a total lack of html skills] we're just gonna dump strips into this topic. Its most definitely going to be a lot lower quality than B&S [Think newspaper comic strip meets crappy chibi styling] Here is a brief lil sketch of the main character, Tzen:


[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/tsen.png[/img]


Of course this will only go ahead with community approval, what do you think?A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Tzen
content:
Heh, well, go ahead. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] I'm looking forward to seeing some Keen related comics or such! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: gah
content:
Working on the site now. It's coming along great so far.

I've been thinking about the webspace, and that would become more of a problem as I am using a subdomain at someone myself... I guess I could ask the admin to create a subdomain for you, but I don't know if he'd allow it because my host is more about RPG creation than comics. I'll try anyway.

If I get a "no", I could still host on my own subdomain but you'd have to contact me with every new comic and site change... I guess Sitesled would be a good place to put the webcomic once it's done.


Oh yeah, I WANT NEW COMIC lol____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]

title: Re: gah
content:
[url=http://www.spheredev.org/~dnaproduct/Tzen/]Done![/url]

It's on my own host currently, so send any new pics to me. Also, could you send me (perhaps over PM) what content should be in the News/Art/About/Links/Misc pages?

When everything is filled in, I will send you the full source so you can upload it on your own host somewhere.


Oh yeah, I've kept updating the comics as simple as possible, as well as selecting which comic is the comic to start with (it's the latest comic that shows up first right now). You'd need the full source though, and I wanna wait giving that out until all pages are filled in and I explained you how to add comics/change content.____________
Don't think of me as an ordinary man.

Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]
